page.title: 11FARMING (cont.,5th page)
page.content: {COCKHILL FARM} This farm has 54 acres of land.Fields about 6 acres. The land is used for beef grazing. The animals kept are beef cows and a family pig. The original farmhouse was a "Devon Long House",and was last lived in about 50 years ago and is now used as a store house.It was one of the first few houses in the parish. This farm used to be called "Middle Cockoo Hill farm ". The animals are fed on grass hay and cattle nuts. Machinary used on the farm ... dung spreader grass topper and tractor and trailers.
